description: A schema to describe a dataset of patients, cohorts or biomaterials from a registry
title: Rare disease patient or biosample registry

@id.description: a primary identifier for the registry

@type.description: the primary type for this registry

name.description: a name or short description for the registry

homepage.description: The primary URL for the homepage of the registry

publisher.description: The primary organisation responsible for publishing and maintaining the registry

disease_cases.description: Information about the individual cases described in the registry
